column2: Because today in America, a third of our kids, after we spend more per student than any country in the world other than a couple rounding errors, to be honest with you, 30 percent are college andor careerready.
column4: Seventy percent of Americans "don't have a college degree."

column2: You were for a singlepayer system, a Canadianstyle system.
